casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON PROFESSIONAL ETHICS JOINT OPINION 732, the Committee on Attorney Advertising Joint Opinion 44, and the Committee on the Unauthorized Practice of Law Joint Opinion 54. M-424/426 September Term 2017
079852 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the Consumers for a Responsive Legal System for leave to file a notice of petition for review as within time (M-424) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to waive the filing fee of $250.00 (M-426) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the petitioner shall submit the $250.00 filing fee in light of the Court's order.
